description: BANG! Web Component custom elements with async templating, smooth syntax and custom void  tags!

scripts.dev: npm run clean && watch -n 5 cp -r src/* docs/ & serve -p 8080 docs/
scripts.test: npm run clean && watch -n 5 ./scripts/build.sh & serve -p 8080 docs/
scripts.prod: export BANG_PROD=test || set BANG_PROD=test&&npm run clean && watch -n 30 npm run pack& serve -p 8080 docs/
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && rm -rf docs/vv && rm docs/*.js || :
scripts.prepublishOnly: export BANG_PROD=test || set BANG_PROD=test&&npm run pack && rm dist/bang.js
scripts.pack: export BANG_PROD=test || set BANG_PROD=test&&./scripts/build.sh && npx roadroller -t text -a eval dist/bang.js -o dist/pack.bang.js && cp dist/pack.bang.js docs/bang.js

author: @dosy
